name: air-table-csv-viewer
description: High-performance CSV viewer and analyzer with advanced trend analysis

scripts.build:production: npm run build && npm run tauri:build
scripts.build:mac: npm run build && tauri build --target aarch64-apple-darwin
scripts.build:mac-intel: npm run build && tauri build --target x86_64-apple-darwin
scripts.build:universal: npm run build && tauri build --target universal-apple-darwin
